02_basics__assignments.stdout:
===== Assignments Test =====
Before assignment (defaults):
a = 0
b1 = 0.0
b2 = 0.0
After a <- 5: a = 5
After b2 <- 3.14: b2 = 3.14
After b1 <- b2: b1 = 3.14
After c <- 'Z': c = Z
After d <- Hello world: d = Hello world
After e <- TRUE: e = True
After f <- 25/12/2025: f = 25/12/2025
===== Assignments Test Complete =====

10_arrays__declarations.stdout:
===== Array Declarations Test =====
Array nums declared: ARRAY [1:10] OF INTEGER
Arrays matrix, grid declared: ARRAY [0:4, 1:3] OF REAL
nums[1] = 100
nums[10] = 999
matrix[0,1] = 1.5
grid[4,3] = 9.9
===== Array Declarations Test Complete =====

11_arrays__indexing_and_whole_assignment.stdout:
===== Array Operations Test =====
1D Array Operations:
After nums[2] <- 5: nums[2] = 5
After nums[1] <- nums[2]: nums[1] = 5, nums[2] = 5
2D Array Operations:
After matrix[4,3] <- 0.01: matrix[4,3] = 0.01
After grid[0,1] <- matrix[4,3]: grid[0,1] = 0.01
Before whole-array assignment:
matrix[0,1] = 0.0, grid[0,1] = 0.01
After matrix <- grid:
matrix[0,1] = 0.01 (was 0.01)
matrix[4,3] = 0.0 (was 0.0)
===== Array Operations Test Complete =====

20_composite__type_and_field_assignment.stdout:
===== Composite Type Test =====
Person type defined with Name (STRING) and Age (INTEGER)
Before assignment:
p.Name =
p.Age = 0
After p.Name <- Alice: p.Name = Alice
After p.Age <- 17: p.Age = 17
Final state: Alice is 17 years old
===== Composite Type Test Complete =====

40_expr__arithmetic_ops.stdout:
Addition (17 + 5) = 22
Subtraction (17 - 5) = 12
Multiplication (17 * 5) = 85
Division (17 / 5) = 3.4
Integer division (17 DIV 5) = 3
Modulus (17 MOD 5) = 2

41_expr__relational_ops.stdout:
x = 10 y = 7
x > y  => True
x < y  => False
x >= y => True
x <= y => False
x = y  => False
x <> y => True

42_expr__logical_ops.stdout:
TRUE AND TRUE = True
TRUE AND FALSE = False
FALSE AND TRUE = False
FALSE AND FALSE = False
TRUE OR TRUE = True
TRUE OR FALSE = True
FALSE OR TRUE = True
FALSE OR FALSE = False
NOT TRUE = False
NOT FALSE = True
NOT (16 >= 18) = True
(TRUE AND TRUE) OR ((16 >= 18) AND TRUE) = True
NOT ((TRUE = FALSE) OR (FALSE = FALSE)) = False

43_expr__complex_precedence.stdout:
a = 7, b = 3
c = (a + b) * (a - b) + a * a => 89
x / y > 3.0 => True
(x - y) <= 10.0 => True
p = (a MOD 2 = 1) => True
q = (b DIV 2 = 1) => True
r = (NOT p) OR (q AND (a + b > 5)) => True
n = (a + b) * 2 - (c DIV 10) => 12
ok = (c >= 0) AND (n <> 0) => True

50_builtins__string_ops.stdout:
RIGHT(ABCDEFGH, 3) returns FGH
LENGTH(Happy Days) returns 10
MID(ABCDEFGH, 2, 3) returns BCD
LCASE(W) returns w
UCASE(h) returns H
Hello + World = Hello World
